patthana17.2:4.1: Abyākataṃ vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.2:5.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.2:6.1: Kusalaṃ vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.2:6.2: Kusalaṃ vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.2:6.3: Kusalaṃ vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo navipākadhammadhammo ca naakusalo navipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.2:7.1: Akusalaṃ vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.2:7.2: Akusalaṃ vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.2:7.3: Akusalaṃ vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo navipākadhammadhammo ca naakusalo navipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana17.2:8.1: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … avigate cha.
patthana17.2:9.1: Abyākataṃ nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.2:9.2: Abyākataṃ nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.2:9.3: Abyākataṃ nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo ca naakusalo nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
